title: Build CI/CD Pipeline
overviewContent: Implemented a CI/CD pipeline to containerize a Spring Boot application using Docker, automate builds with GitHub Actions, and deploy seamlessly to AWS Elastic Beanstalk. Configured AWS IAM for secure integration between GitHub Actions and AWS services, ensuring efficient deployment and scalability.

skills: Spring Boot (Maven): Application code built with Spring Boot; Maven for build management.
Docker: Containerization—packaging everything the application needs to run consistently
AWS Elastic Container Registry: AWS-hosted repository for Docker images.
AWS Elastic Beanstalk: Managed platform to deploy and scale the application.
GitHub Actions: Automated CI/CD workflows integrated with GitHub.
jd: Packaged a Spring Boot project (built with Maven) into a Docker container.
Built a Docker image and pushed it to AWS ECR using GitHub Actions.
Created an AWS IAM user and granted the necessary permissions for GitHub Actions to connect with AWS services.
Deployed the Docker image to AWS Elastic Beanstalk (EB).
